leaflet.personalStatement: I think it would be great to have a local MP who grew up here, Andrew is a great campaigner and will work to protect local jobs and get the economy back on track.

contactInformation.address: Andrew Pakes, Labour Action Centre, 112 Newport Road, Milton Keynes, MK13 0AA

endorsements.endorsement: I think it would be great to have a local MP who grew up here, Andrew is a great campaigner and will work to protect local jobs and get the economy back on track.

images.caption: A positive local choice for Milton Keynes North
